D) less competition

Earth has a definite orbit within the solar system. This orbit is mainly a result of the

A) distance between other planets.
B) pulling force of other planets.
C) size of the Moon.
D) mass of the Sun.

C) Sun's gravitational pull
D) location of earth's orbit

Answer with just the letter (A, B, C, or D)
